sources.title: Manhattan Tower (1932) MARY BRIANüçï NOEL FRANCISüçï FRANK STRAYER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Director: Frank Strayer
Stars: Noel Francis, Mary Brian, James Hall
üçïNEW HD RESTORATIONüçï
Holy Cats! Before King Kong scaled its soaring heights, director Frank Strayer delivered his cinematic Valentine to the brand-new Art Deco wonder ‚Äî the Empire State Building! 

The lives of a number of the workers and executives in the iconic Manhattan skyscraper are intertwined by the actions of a philandering and crooked company boss.

Sweetheart MARY BRIAN chases big city dreams, while NOEL FRANCIS sizzles as the office bad girl. It‚Äôs a towering pre-Code gem packed with high-rise scandal, forbidden romance, and sky-high intrigue.
